entry.title: Face Adapter, One-Click Facial Expression Control and Face Swap Package for Windows
entry.content:
Face Adapter: One-Click Facial Expression Control and Face Swap Package for Windows

The download link is: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=122446863.

Recently, the AI field has been buzzing with excitement over a new technology ‚Äì Face Adapter. This adapter is specifically designed for pre-trained diffusion models, enabling facial reenactment and face swapping while offering precise individual recognition and attribute control functionalities. With this model, you can generate two images simultaneously: one that retains the facial features of the original image and another that incorporates the expression features of the target image, achieving seamless facial information transfer and fusion. The advent of Face Adapter is set to revolutionize the field of facial editing.

In the realm of facial editing, particularly in tasks like facial reenactment and face swapping, existing technologies often fall short. Face Adapter was created to address these shortcomings.

Facial Reenactment

Current SD adapters struggle to control fine-grained target structures based on text attributes during facial editing.

Face Swapping

In the task of face swapping, existing SD adapters face challenges in generating facial details and handling changes in facial shapes.

Adapter Design

Face Adapter boasts the following features:

  • Fully Decoupled Individual Recognition (ID), Target Structure, and Attribute Control: This design allows a single model to handle both facial reenactment and face swapping tasks.
  • Addressing Overlooked Issues: Face Adapter focuses on and resolves issues that have been neglected in existing technologies.
  • Simple and Effective, Plug-and-Play: Its straightforward design makes it easy to integrate into existing systems.

Quick Start Guide

Face Adapter is available as a one-click startup package, eliminating the hassle of configuring the environment.

Computer Requirements

  • Windows 10/11 64-bit operating system
  • NVIDIA graphics card with 8GB or more VRAM

Download and Usage Instructions

  1. Download the ZIP Package:
    Download link: https://xueshu.fun/4916/

  2. Extract the Files:
    After extraction, ensure there are no Chinese characters in the path. Double-click the ‚Äúrun.exe‚Äù file to execute.

  3. Access via Browser:
    Open your browser and visit http://127.0.0.1:7860/ to use Face Adapter in your browser.

entry.title: CodeFormer for Mac, Powerful AI Face Restoration Tool for Local Use
entry.content:
CodeFormer for Mac: Powerful AI Face Restoration Tool for Local Use

Have you ever encountered blurry, severely damaged old photos that you wanted to restore but didn‚Äôt know where to start? Or do you have precious video clips that are hard to enjoy due to poor quality? Don‚Äôt worry, today I am introducing you to a magical tool called CodeFormer.

The download link is: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=122446863.

What is CodeFormer?

CodeFormer is hailed as the ‚Äúindustry‚Äôs top AI de-mosaic tool,‚Äù effectively removing obstacles in the path of study and research. This tool uses cutting-edge neural network AI technology, capable of precisely restoring various damaged, blurry, incomplete, and black-and-white photos and videos with astonishing results.

üêº Intelligent Restoration of Old Photos

Your family‚Äôs old photos may have become blurry over time. CodeFormer can bring these precious memories back to life.

High-Precision Face Restoration

Do some photos lose their charm due to blurry facial details? CodeFormer can help you rediscover those forgotten faces.

Facial Color Enhancement and Restoration

Even black-and-white photos can be brought to life. CodeFormer not only restores but also enhances facial colors.

Facial Detail Filling and Restoration

CodeFormer can also help you complete those incomplete faces.

Features

  1. One-Click Operation: CodeFormer provides a straightforward user interface where users can upload the images or videos they want to clarify, and with one click, the entire clarification process is completed without the need for complex parameter settings.
  2. Batch Processing: Supports batch import of images and video files, allowing you to clarify multiple files at once, significantly improving work efficiency.
  3. Intelligent Optimization: Utilizing deep learning technology, CodeFormer can automatically identify blurry parts of the image and optimize them intelligently for clearer images.
  4. High-Quality Output: The clarified images and videos maintain high resolution and quality, meeting users‚Äô needs in various scenarios.

Installation Guide

To simplify the installation process, the tool has been packaged into a standalone startup package. Users can simply click to run without configuring a complicated Python environment. Here are the detailed steps to obtain and install the application:

Note: Only supports devices with Mac M1/2/3 series chips.

Installation Steps

  1. Download the DMG image file from the above link and drag the app file into the Applications folder.

  1. After copying the installation, do not open it from the Launchpad for the first time. Instead, right-click to open it from the Applications folder.

  2. The software will automatically open the operation interface in the default browser at the address http://127.0.0.1:7860/, where you can start using it in the browser.

entry.title: ChatTTS-UI for Mac, the Ultimate Tool for Text-to-Speech Conversion, API Supported!
entry.content:
ChatTTS-UI for Mac: The Ultimate Tool for Text-to-Speech Conversion, API Supported!

The download link is: https://www.patreon.com/user/shop/chattts-ui-for-mac-ultimate-tool-for-to-249930?u=122446863&utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=productshare_creator&utm_content=join_link.

Recently, there‚Äôs an exciting project called ChatTTS-UI. It‚Äôs a simple local web interface that uses ChatTTS to convert text to speech and supports external API calls. The project is open-source and can be found here: https://github.com/jianchang512/ChatTTS-ui

Features of ChatTTS-UI

Compared to the official usage page, ChatTTS-UI has the following features:

  • Mixed effects of text, numbers, and symbol control characters
  • Optimization of Chinese text normalization
  • Added speed control (speed 1-9)
  • Fixed voice tone
  • Added compile=true to enable inference optimization
  • Numbers are converted to corresponding language pronunciations
  • Added Chinese-English word segmentation function
  • Improved interface and API
  • Added top_p and top_k parameter controls
  • Multi-line text synthesized line by line
  • Custom voice tone seed value
  • Option to skip the refine text stage
  • Online text synthesis via web page
  • API interface support

Installation Guide

To simplify the installation process, I have packaged the tool into a standalone startup package. Users can run it with a simple click without the need for configuring a complex Python environment. Here are the detailed steps to obtain and install the application:

Download the Application

Note: Only supports devices with Mac M1/2/3 series chips.

Installation Steps

  1. Download the DMG image file from the link above and drag the app file into the Applications folder.

  2. After copying and completing the installation, do not open it from the Launchpad for the first time. Instead, right-click in the Applications folder to open it.

  3. The software will automatically open the operation interface in the default browser, and you can start using it in the browser.

ChatTTS Usage Tips

Control Symbols Available in Text

You can intersperse control symbols in the original text to be synthesized. Currently, two control symbols are supported: laughter and pause.

  • [laugh] represents laughter
  • [uv_break] represents a pause

For example:

In the actual synthesis, [laugh] will be replaced by laughter, and [uv_break] will introduce a pause. The intensity of laughter and pauses can be controlled by passing prompt in the params_refine_text parameter.

Skipping the Refine Text Stage

The actual synthesis will re-organize (refine) the text with control symbols. If you do not want this, you can set the skip_refine_text parameter to True.

Fixing the Voice Tone

By default, each synthesis randomly calls a different voice tone, which can be unfriendly. To simply fix the voice role, you can manually set a random seed and then get a random speaker.

Through testing, 2222 7869 6653 are male voices, and 3333 4099 5099 are female voices. You can test different seed numbers to find more voices.

API Request Tutorial

Request Method: POST
Request URL: http://127.0.0.1:9966/tts

Request Parameters:

  • text: str | Required, the text to be synthesized
  • voice: int | Optional, default 2222, the number determining the voice tone, 2222 | 7869 | 6653 | 4099 | 5099, you can choose one or pass any value to use a random voice tone
  • prompt: str | Optional, default empty, set laughter, pause, for example [oral_2][laugh_0][break_6]
  • temperature: float | Optional, default 0.3
  • top_p: float | Optional, default 0.7
  • top_k: int | Optional, default 20
  • skip_refine: int | Optional, default 0, 1=skip refine text, 0=do not skip
  • custom_voice: int | Optional, default 0, the seed value for custom voice tone, needs to be an integer greater than 0, if set, it will take precedence and ignore voice
  • is_split: int | Optional, default 0, 1=convert numbers to text for correct pronunciation, 0=keep unchanged

Response: JSON data

Successful response:

Where audio_files is an array of dictionaries, each element dict is {filename: absolute path of the wav file, url: downloadable wav URL}

Error response:

API Call Code

Successful call result:

Error result:

entry.title: Mac Image Restoration Application, Revitalize Your Old Photos
entry.content:
Mac Image Restoration Application: Revitalize Your Old Photos

The download link is: https://www.patreon.com/user/shop/mac-image-restoration-application-your-249928?u=122446863&utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=productshare_creator&utm_content=join_link.

Hello everyone! Today, I want to introduce a super cool online tool called inpaint-web! This is a free and open-source tool based on WebGPU and WASM technology that you can use directly in your browser to repair and upscale images without the need to install any software. Imagine you have an old photo with some blemishes or unwanted objects. With inpaint-web‚Äôs image restoration feature, you can easily remove these imperfections. There is also a feature for enhancing image resolution. If you have old photos with low resolution, inpaint-web can help you increase the resolution, making the details clearer!

What is inpaint-web?

inpaint-web is a free and open-source tool based on WebGPU and WASM technology that enables image restoration (inpainting) and upscaling directly in the browser. This means you don‚Äôt need to install any software; just open your browser to perform high-quality image processing.

Key Features

  • Inpaint (Image Restoration): Whether it‚Äôs blemishes or unwanted objects in your photos, inpaint-web can intelligently fill or remove them, making your images look flawless.
  • Super-Resolution (Image Upscaling): Have old photos with low resolution? inpaint-web can increase the image resolution, making the details clearer.

Technical Support

  • WebGPU: The next-generation Web graphics API provides more efficient graphics rendering capabilities.
  • WASM (WebAssembly): A binary instruction format designed for modern web browsers, allowing near-native performance in the browser.

Installation Guide

To simplify the installation process, the tool has been packaged into a standalone launch package. Users only need to click to run it, without the need to configure a complex Python environment. Here are the detailed steps to obtain and install the application:

Download the Application

Note: Only supports devices with Mac M1/2/3 series chips.

Installation Steps

  1. Download the DMG image file from the above link and drag the app file to the Applications folder.

  1. After copying the installation, do not open it from the Launchpad on the first launch; right-click to open it from the Applications folder.
  2. The software will automatically open the operation interface in the default browser at http://127.0.0.1:7860/, at which point you can start using it in the browser.

Usage Instructions

  1. Upload the image you want to process.
  2. Choose the restoration or upscaling function.
  3. Wait for the intelligent algorithm in the browser to complete the processing.
  4. Download or share the processed image.

Conclusion

inpaint-web is not just a tool but a product of the collective wisdom of the open-source community, combining technology and creativity. Whether you are a professional photographer or an image processing enthusiast, inpaint-web can be a great assistant to enhance the quality of your work.

entry.title: One-Click Local Package of the CausalLM 7B Model on Mac
entry.content:
One-Click Local Package of the CausalLM 7B Model on Mac

The download link is: https://www.patreon.com/user/shop/one-click-local-package-of-causallm-7b-249922?u=122446863&utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=productshare_creator&utm_content=join_link.

The CausalLM 7B model is developed based on Qwen‚Äôs model weights and is trained on an unfiltered internet dataset. Due to the lack of rigorous review of the training data, the model may generate inappropriate content, such as pornography, violence, and offensive language. Users must take responsibility for checking the safety of the model‚Äôs output and filter out sensitive vocabulary. Given the limitations of computational resources, we are currently unable to perform reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF) for ethical and safety reinforcement, nor can we apply restrictive fine-tuning (SFT) to train the model to refuse certain types of questions.

Installation Guide

To simplify the installation process, we provide a packaged startup kit, so users do not need to configure a complex Python environment. Just follow a few steps to start using it. Here is a detailed guide on how to obtain and install the CausalLM 7B application:

Download the Application

Note: This application only supports devices equipped with Mac M1/2/3 series chips.

Installation Steps

  1. Download the DMG image file from the link provided above.
  2. Double-click the file. After opening it, you will see the following interface:

Please drag the CausalLM 7B.app icon to the Applications folder.

  1. After installation, do not open the application directly from the Launchpad. Instead, go to the Applications folder and right-click to select Open.

  1. Open the operation interface in your browser at the address: http://127.0.0.1:5001/. Now, you can start using the CausalLM 7B model in your browser.

entry.title: DreamTalk, AI Digital Human Integration Package for Mac
entry.content:
AI Digital Human Integration Package for Mac: DreamTalk

The download link is: https://www.patreon.com/user/shop/ai-digital-human-integration-package-for-246930?u=122446863&utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=productshare_creator&utm_content=join_link.

DreamTalk is an audio-driven, diffusion-based emoticon pack generation framework capable of creating high-quality emoticon pack videos, covering a variety of speaking styles. DreamTalk demonstrates robust performance when processing various inputs, including songs, multilingual speech, noisy audio, and out-of-domain portraits.

DreamTalk‚Äôs signature feature is to animate a face from just a single portrait image. With the input of a voice, it‚Äôs no problem for the face to start speaking, and it can even sync lip movements and expressions to generate a video of a talking head. Based on the large model framework, DreamTalk can learn and infer expressive styles from the input voice and portrait to create personalized expression videos. Even using the same audio source, the portrait can exhibit different emotional expressions such as anger, happiness, sadness, and disdain, with corresponding facial expressions, as shown below.

I have packaged the above tools into an easy-to-launch package, which is ready to use with a single click, avoiding various issues with downloading or configuration.

entry.title: One-Click Gradio Web APP for MimicBrush on Windows
entry.content:
One-Click Gradio Web APP for MimicBrush on Windows

A few days ago, researchers from Alibaba, the University of Hong Kong, and Ant Group jointly launched an incredibly powerful AI tool called MimicBrush. This tool is like a ‚Äúmagic wand‚Äù in the realm of image editing, allowing you to easily designate areas on an image that need editing and then locally redraw them with the style of another image. Sounds cool, doesn‚Äôt it? Let‚Äôs take a closer look at just how magical this ‚Äúmagic wand‚Äù is!

Key Features of MimicBrush

1. Reference Image Simulation

MimicBrush can analyze and replicate visual features from a reference image, then apply those features to the designated area of the source image. It‚Äôs like dressing up your picture in a new outfit, ensuring consistency in style and content.

2. Zero-Sample Image Editing

There‚Äôs no need for the original target image; you only need to provide a reference image containing the desired effect, and MimicBrush can achieve the editing effect via reference imitation. It‚Äôs like a ‚Äúzero-entry barrier‚Äù wizard for image editing!

3. Text-to-Image Alignment

MimicBrush also leverages a CLIP encoder and VAE to realize text-to-image alignment. You can guide the editing process by entering text descriptions, almost as if you‚Äôre telling the AI, ‚ÄúDo it this way!‚Äù

4. Diversified Editing Results

Whether it‚Äôs local area editing, texture transfer, or post-processing optimization, MimicBrush can showcase a variety of editing results, freeing your creativity from the limitations of tools.

Application Scenarios

MimicBrush is particularly suitable for product customization, character design, and special effects production. It not only simplifies complex editing workflows but also greatly enhances editing efficiency and flexibility. Its underlying framework is based on the combination of the SD1.5 diffusion model and the MimicBrush model, making it the ‚Äúultimate weapon‚Äù in AI image editing.

Quick Start Guide

MimicBrush has been packaged into a one-click launch bundle, which you can use with a simple click, eliminating worries about configuration issues.

Download URL: https://www.patreon.com/user/shop/one-click-gradio-web-app-for-mimicbrush-245730?u=122446863&utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=productshare_creator&utm_content=join_link

System Requirements

  • Windows 10/11 64-bit OS
  • NVIDIA graphics card with 8GB VRAM or more

Download and Tutorial

  1. Download the Zip File and Unzip the File:

After unzipping, avoid having Chinese characters in the path. Double-click the ‚Äúrun.exe‚Äù file to run, as shown below.

  1. Access via Browser:

Open your browser and visit http://127.0.0.1:7860/ to use MimicBrush in the browser.

The fusion capability of this tool can accurately integrate the facial features of the target into a template image, creating a new image with the target‚Äôs facial traits while maintaining the original posture, expression, and actions. entry.title: Mac Exclusive Large Model Standalone Application Chat-with-MLX, Supporting RAGÔºÅ
entry.content:
Mac Exclusive Large Model Standalone Application Chat-with-MLX, Supporting RAGÔºÅ

Hello everyone, today I want to introduce a revolutionary product designed specifically for Apple Silicon Macs‚Äî[Chat with MLX]:https://github.com/qnguyen3/chat-with-mlx!

This is not just a chat tool but a full-featured large language model chat interface. It leverages Apple‚Äôs MLX framework to provide an unprecedented level of privacy protection and chat experience. Chat with MLX is based on Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) technology, capable of interacting with various open-source models, supporting multiple file formats, and adding YouTube videos via URL. This application supports multilingual interaction, easily integrates any HuggingFace and MLX-compatible open-source models, and is particularly suitable for use on macOS and Apple Silicon.

Highlights of Chat-with-MLX

Chat-with-MLX is a chat interface based on ‚ÄúRetrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)‚Äù that can utilize multiple open-source models to enhance the chat experience. With this tool, users can interact with their data, supporting various file formats (such as doc(x), pdf, txt) and adding YouTube videos via URL. It supports multilingual interaction, including English, Spanish, Chinese, Vietnamese, and Turkish. Additionally, Chat-with-MLX can easily integrate any HuggingFace and MLX-compatible open-source models, providing a native RAG example for macOS and Apple Silicon.

Use Cases

  1. Multilingual Data Query: When you need to query specific data in different languages, whether it‚Äôs text, PDF files, or online videos.
  2. Enhance Chat Experience with Powerful Models: Utilize advanced open-source models (such as Google Gemma, Mistral, StableLM, etc.) to improve the responsiveness and accuracy of chat applications.
  3. Research and Development: Ideal for users with research and development needs in AI and machine learning, especially in an Apple Silicon (e.g., M1 chip) environment, leveraging the MLX framework for efficient development and testing.
  4. Document Management and Retrieval: When you need to retrieve information from a large amount of text or multimedia content, providing a more intuitive and faster access method.

Key Features

  • Supports chatting with data, including various file formats and YouTube videos.
  • Multilingual support.
  • Easily integrates various HuggingFace and MLX-compatible open-source models.
  • Native RAG support on macOS and Apple Silicon.

Installation Guide

To simplify the installation process, Chat-with-MLX is packaged into a standalone launcher. Users can run it with a simple click, without the need to configure a complex Python environment.

Chat with MLX standalone application download URL: https://www.patreon.com/user/shop/chat-with-mlx-standalone-application-for-243328?u=122446863&utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=productshare_creator&utm_content=join_link

Note: The Chat-with-MLX App only supports devices equipped with the Mac M1/2/3 series chips.

Installation Steps

  1. Download the DMG image file from the above link, and drag the app file into the Applications folder.
  2. After the installation is complete, do not open it from the Launchpad for the first time; instead, right-click to open it in the Applications folder, as shown below. For more details, refer to Common Issues with Installing Software on Mac.
  3. The software will automatically open the operation interface in the default browser, with the address http://127.0.0.1:7860/. You can start using it in the browser at this point.

  • After selecting a model, click to load the model to start chatting. Click on RAG settings to load local data.

  • In addition to the integrated Tongyi Qianwen model, you can also add other MLX models in the model management section.

Model and Memory Configuration

The table below shows the availability of different model sizes under various memory configurations. The left value in each cell indicates the availability of 4-bit quantization, while the right value indicates the availability of 8-bit quantization for the corresponding model size and memory combination.

For example, if your model size is between 14B and 34B parameters and you have 48GB of memory, you can use 4-bit quantization (‚úÖ), but 8-bit quantization is not available (‚ùå).

entry.title: Portable Facefusion 2.6.1 for Mac with Apple silicon
entry.content:
Facefusion: AI Face Swap App for Mac

Facefusion is an open-source AI video/picture face swapping tool. It comes with a brand new user interface and offers a web page operation similar to Stable Diffusion, greatly enhancing the user experience. The face fusion feature of this tool can precisely infuse the characteristics of the target face into the template image, generating a new image that contains the target facial features while maintaining the original posture, expression, and movement. Facefusion supports various fusion modes, including single face fusion, multi-face fusion, and specific face selection fusion.

Installation Guide

To simplify the installation process, Facefusion is packaged into a standalone launcher. Users can run it with a simple click, without the need to configure a complex Python environment.

Note: The Facefusion App only supports devices equipped with the Mac M1/2/3 series chips.

Installation Steps

  1. Download the DMG image file from the link above.
  2. Double-click to open the image file, and you will see the following interface:

Drag the app file into the Applications folder.

  1. In the Applications folder, find the app, right-click and choose ‚ÄúOpen‚Äù to avoid security restrictions on the first launch.

  2. The first launch may take some time, please be patient.

  3. The software will automatically open the operation interface in the default browser, the address is http://127.0.0.1:7860/, and now you can start using Facefusion in the browser.

Usage Suggestions

  • The AI face swap model of Facefusion is pre-installed locally, so it can be used normally without an internet connection.

  • To improve running speed, it is recommended to select the coreml option during use.
